short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a button to print loans slip immediately in Alma ExLibris.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a "Print the Receipt" button to the ALma "Manage Patron Services" page. The receipt will be printed almost immediately, bypassing the email printing method routinely used. Printing occurs on the local (your computer) default printer
